title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight Landmarks Paris City Pack
description:
In this addon spotlight we will have a look at the Landmarks Paris City Pack released by ORBX for MSFS 2020. This addon adds 15 high-detail custom landscape amongst them: Notre Dame, PanthÃ©on, The Centre Pompidou, Ã‰cole Militaire, and Ã‰glise Saint-Sulpice. Additionally 200 medium-detail custom landmarks are being added.

We will have a look at both the daytime and nighttime view while flying over the city. I must say I am again impressed by the high quality the ORBX team has delivered and can't wait for their next landmarks addon being released.

The addon can be downloaded from the site below:
https://orbxdirect.com/product/landmarks-paris-msfs
